identity.name: TruckerMaps
identity.mission: Simplify the complex life of a truck driver. Zero distraction, maximum clarity.
principles: Fat Finger Friendly: Minimum touch target 56px.
Glanceability: Information must be readable in 0.5 seconds.
Map is King: The map is the background, UI floats on top.
Role-Specific Reality: Drivers see the road, Managers see the fleet.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPLEMENT ROLE-BASED ROUTING: Check user role on login. If 'driver' -> /driver/dashboard. If 'manager' -> /manager/dashboard.
2. FIX THE MAP: Replace the default OSM tiles with the CartoDB tiles defined in 'map_configuration'. Apply the CSS filters.
3. GOOGLE MAPS UX: For the Route Planner, make the map full screen. Put the input fields in a floating card (top-left or bottom-sheet on mobile).
4. DRIVER DASHBOARD: Must be 'Glanceable'. Show ONLY: Remaining Drive Time, Next Break, Current Job. No clutter.
5. MANAGER DASHBOARD: Use the 'Bento Grid' layout. Show Fleet Status, Fuel Costs, Active Routes.
6. NAVIGATION MODE: When in 'Nav Mode', hide all non-essential UI. Show only the next turn instruction (big arrow) and ETA.
7. SCROLL FIX: Ensure 'body { overflow: hidden; }' for the map view to prevent the 'bouncy' scroll effect. The map container should handle its own panning.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to every button and input.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for floating controls.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable inside containers.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
